title: Making a Team for bronzes who want to escape bronze!!!
body:
find yourself stuck in bronze because u win lane then your team feeds??  Well im the same I was a s4 in season 5 and after 8 wins in provisional rito put me in b5 even though I still had a positive kda in the games I lost and never went negative.  Now ive been in bronze for a week and haven't moved because the players I get teamed with are new and often lose lane and we end up losing.  So ive decied to form a team/duo so that we can escape bronze and be free.  

If you want to duo, add me or comment below. 

If you want to join the team add me or comment below. :) 

Have a nice day all :)

replies.body: I was G5 last season and they put me in Silver 4, 3 weeks later i G5 , rito plz

I main ADC, Support, Jungle im down for this team uh add me 
 IGN: Matthews

I haven't done my placement yet but pretty sure stuck in bronze. 
Ign : Uniucky
Main : Support (all champs) > Top > Jungle > Mid > Adc

same story, from s1 to b4 after placements. I forgot how toxic bronze is, have got b3 already but so painful. Just want to get out of here as quick as possible. Support > Jungle > Top  in that order IGN: scratuis

If you need a mid laner or Adc 
IGN:TheGingninj69

Play al lanes well
IGN: jollylolly

Bronze II Can Support, Jg, and learning Top/Mid

IGN: Sir Dawnfire

IGN: The Vision. 
All-round player, can play top,mid,jungle,support and adc
PLZ ADD ME INGRAMATOR Ill play ANYTHING your liege {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
I'll DUO and/ or join the ranked team, b4 supp/ top main. :) add me.
IGN - Fitzky Top and Jungle main
Bronze 3 ADC and Jungle Main, was Silver last season, trying to climb back up and hit gold :)
